data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ribeiro-Júnior, Marco A. (2015): Catalogue of distribution of lizards (Reptilia: Squamata) from the Brazilian Amazonia. I. Dactyloidae, Hoplocercidae, Iguanidae, Leiosauridae, Polychrotidae, Tropiduridae. Zootaxa 3983 (3): 1-110, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3983.1.1
